lines.text:
[Emily has just fallen on her back after someone fires shots at her and Kaori goes to help her up]
Kaori, don't move her!

[Joe is staring at Emily's opened legs in her short skirt]
I can see her panties. 'Clear as a bright blue sky on a warm summer day'.

[disgusted and enraged, Kaori grabs a giant hammer]
Joe... I *hate* your perverted poetry!

[Emily has just stopped Joe from getting her by using Kaori's giant hammer]
Okay, I shoulda seen this coming.
Kaori used this thing and I asked her if I could try it.
This is a great way to blow off some steam. Okay, one more time!

[runs away when Emily raises the hammer]
WHOOOOA! Wait a second! That's not a toy!
No! I'm just worried that you might hurt yourself!
[Emily takes another swipe at his head and he darts out of the way]

[Emily has just heard gunfire and she runs out to see Kaori holding a silenced uzi and Joe with Emily's panties in his mouth]
Kaori wait! Let me explain... I'm a guy, I'm suppose to check stuff like this!

[narrows eyes sharply]
Three chances are all you're gonna get, Joe! Next time, you're gonna be a 'holey man'!
